import React , {useEffect}from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import "../addEmployee/addEmp.css" const UpdateEmp = () => { const [data, setData] = useState({ Name: "", email: "", mobile: "", designation:"", gender:"", course:"", img:"Photo" }); const {id} = useParams(); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/api/getone/${id}`) .then((response)=>{ setData(response) }) .catch((err)=>{ console.log(err) }) }) const handleChange = ({ currentTarget: input }) => { setData({ ...data, [input.name]: input.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await axios.put("") .then((response)=>{ Navigate() }).catch((err)) }; return (

Edit Employee

Male Female
MCA BCA BSC
) } export default UpdateEmp;
